definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

sentences.english: Being opposed to various anti-Party activities, so that supports the Party unification.
sentences.chinese: 反对各种反党分裂活动，维护党的团结统一。

sentences.english: The use of novels for anti-Party activity is a great invention.
sentences.chinese: 利用小说进行反党活动是一大发明。

definition: capitalist roader (person in power taking the capitalist road, a political label often pinned on cadres by the Red Guards during the Cultural Revolution)
Communist Party/abbr. for 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3]
Gang of Four: Jiang Qing 江青, Zhang Chunqiao 張春橋, Yao Wenyuan 姚文元, Wang Hongwen 王洪文, who served as scapegoats for the excesses of the cultural revolution
Chen Boda (1904-1989), communist party theorist, interpreter of Maoism
to eliminate counterrevolutionaries (abbr. for 肅清反革命份子|肃清反革命分子[su4 qing1 fan3 ge2 ming4 fen4 zi3])
Zhang Guotao (1897-1979), Chinese communist leader in the 1920s and 1930s, defected to Guomindang in 1938
